item.title: Assignments
item.description: The assignments for the course consisted of 3 papers and a text presentation. Papers Each paper should have a length of 5-7 pages or approximately 2000 words. ASSIGNMENTS DESCRIPTIONS Paper 1 (PDF) Readings Feinberg, Joel. “Psychological Egoism.” In Reason and Responsibility: Readings in Some Basic Problems of Philosophy. 10th ed. Edited by Joel Feinberg and Russ Shafer-Landau. Belmont, CA: Wadsworth, 1999, pp. 493-505. ISBN: 9780534543518. Questions Answer all three questions. You can distribute the pages as you like, but a good answer to any of the questions is likely to take at least a page.
